heading: Building the Future of
subtitle: We're on a mission to make professional website creation accessible to everyone, powered by AI and modern technology.
missionText: We believe that creating beautiful, professional websites shouldn't require a team of developers or expensive agencies. Cmssy empowers creators, businesses, and developers to build stunning websites with AI-powered tools, intuitive drag-and-drop editing, and enterprise-grade performance.

values.title: Innovation First
values.description: We leverage AI and modern technology to make website creation effortless and accessible to everyone.

values.title: User-Centric
values.description: Every feature we build starts with understanding our users' needs and pain points.

values.title: Community Driven
values.description: We believe in building together. Your feedback shapes our roadmap and priorities.

values.title: Performance Obsessed
values.description: We're committed to building the fastest, most reliable CMS on the market.
